attributes.action: The next England football manager referendum (Peoples choice)
attributes.additional_details: The English FA have now proven that they need assistance from the people to take part in this decision making process.
attributes.background:
Following the recent continued disappointment it is now time to let the people of England decide who is best suited to take our national team forward.
Football is the most supported national sport, however currently have no say in the decision making process.
Let the people decide!
